channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra : une vidéo dévoile son design massif en avance
item.description: L'année 2025 se termine sur une note explosive pour les fans de Samsung. Alors que la présentation officielle n'est attendue qu'en février, une fuite d'une ampleur inédite vient de lever le voile sur le design définitif des futurs fleurons de la marque.

item.title: Samsung is reportedly readying a Brain Health feature to check for early signs of dementia
item.description: Brain Health by Samsung is apparently going to be launching at the CES 2026 show in January.

item.title: How to watch the NVIDIA CES 2026 presentation live
item.description: CFOTO via Getty Images At CES 2025, NVIDIA spent the bulk of its presentation touting (what else) its leading position in the artificial intelligence arena. But it also spent time talking up new hardware, including its RTX 5000-series GPUs and Project Digits desktop supercomputer (later redubbed Spark). This year, the company's website says it's "lighting up CES 2026 with the power of AI." To that end, NVIDIA is pulling out all the stops at its Vegas installation, promising hands-on demos in its booth at the Fontainebleau, replete with the "latest NVIDIA solutions driving innovation and produc...

item.title: Free speech’s great leap backwards
item.description: In early December, Joshua Aaron, the developer behind the ICEBlock app - designed to let people alert others about the presence of Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE) agents - filed a federal lawsuit alleging his First Amendment rights were violated. The Department of Justice had urged Apple to remove Aaron's app from its App Store, […]

item.title: Le Galaxy S26 Ultra se dévoile en vidéo et il a tout d’une brique
item.description: Le design du Galaxy S26 Ultra ne fait plus aucun doute. Une fuite dévoile un smartphone aux arêtes bien droites.

item.title: Nvidia in 2025: year in review
item.description: AI profits hit new heights, but it's been something of a rollercoaster for Nvidia this year with its new generation of Blackwell GPUs.

item.title: Amazon fait −63 % sur le chargeur rapide Xiaomi 120 W qui détecte vos appareils et adapte la puissance automatiquement
item.description: Avec le Xiaomi 120W Hypercharge Combo Type-A vous allez vite retrouver de l'autonomie sur vos appareils, surtout qu'il est en promo à 25,69 euros au lieu de 69,99 euros.

item.title: Commodore 64 Ultimate Review: An Astonishing Remake
item.description: The reborn Commodore 64 is an astonishing remake—but daunting if you weren’t there the first time around.

item.title: You can’t reach a goal without a plan
item.description: To achieve your aims, keep them realistic—and make a detailed road map for reaching them. I’ve done it, you’ve done it, we’ve all done it. With the best of intentions, we set big goals for our future: get a work promotion, lose 20 pounds, run a marathon. And too often, we give up a few months later, realizing we bit off more than we could chew. Why? We get enamored with the idea but the execution? Not so much. Goals can seem straightforward, but without a specific plan or realistic milestones, they quickly fizzle out....

item.title: The Morning After: What to expect at CES 2026
item.description: CES 2026 is right around the corner, and the pre-show hype cycle/ early reveals suggest, yes, there’s going to be an awful lot of AI-powered insert-product-category-here alongside, thankfully, some major announcements from the likes of Intel, Sony and NVIDIA. Intel is finally unveiling its Panther Lake (Core Ultra Series 3) chips. The first chips built on Intel’s 2nm process could offer a 50 percent performance boost, which is sorely needed amid intense competition. NVIDIA’s Jensen Huang is taking the stage for a keynote expected to feature a lot of AI hype, while AMD’s Lisa Su will likely cou...

item.title: Pour la première fois, un avion a été posé en urgence sans intervention humaine directe
item.description: Poser un avion de façon autonome avec son système de pilotage automatique est courant. Mais dans le cas de ce Beechcraft Super King Air dont la cabine était dépressurisée, c’est la première fois qu’un tel système est utilisé pour atterrir en urgence.

item.title: Thousands of servers exposed as MongoBleed vulnerability exploited
item.description: A proof-of-concept is now available on the internet, and around 87,000 servers are at risk.

item.title: Gizmodo’s Guide to the Coolest Space Missions of 2026
What Is a Preamp, and Do I Really Need One?
item.description: If you've wondered what a preamplifier is, what it exactly does, and whether your audio setup is missing one, we've got the answers—as well as some of our top recommendations.

item.title: This Disney+, Hulu and ESPN bundle deal is too good to pass up – here are 3 shows I recommend streaming first
item.description: From superheroes to aliens, here's what to stream first with the Disney+, Hulu and ESPN discount deal.

item.title: The 5 weirdest brand partnerships from 2025 prove collabs have lost the plot
item.description: Hint: ketchup luggage, ‘Stranger Things’ soap, and hot sauce energy drinks ahead. Ketchup-inspired luggage. Soap based on the characters from Stranger Things. A hot sauce energy drink. These are just a few of the brand collaborations that we’ve seen in 2025—and it’s safe to say that all’s not well in the world of brand partnerships.

item.title: 7 CEOs share their New Year’s resolutions
item.description: These chief executives are creating New Year’s resolutions to push themselves and their companies in 2026. Hello and welcome to Modern CEO! I’m Stephanie Mehta, CEO and chief content officer of Mansueto Ventures. Each week this newsletter explores inclusive approaches to leadership drawn from conversations with executives and entrepreneurs, and from the pages of Inc. and Fast Company. If you received this newsletter from a friend, you can sign up to get it yourself every Monday morning....
